note: This data is measured in [international-$](#dod:int_dollar_abbreviation) at 2021 prices to account for inflation and differences in living costs between countries. It relates to income (measured after taxes and benefits) or to consumption, [per capita](#dod:per-capita).
title: Share in extreme poverty vs. life expectancy
subtitle: The [period life expectancy](#dod:period-life-expectancy) at birth, in a given year. Extreme poverty is defined as living below the [International Poverty Line](#dod:international-poverty-line) of $3 per day.
